name: wls
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body: # wls 1.0 # Web Directory Listing ![wls](https://raw.github.com/prashanta/wls/master/test/screen-1.png) ### Installation ---------------- Copy the contents of wls to the director that you want to have it managed. All the consequent sub folders will be managed. Yup, thats it. ### Which files are ignored? ---------------------------- - index.php - Any file/folder that begins with "." ### 3rd Party: ---------------------------- - jQuery: http://jquery.com/ - tablesorter: http://tablesorter.com/docs/ Demo: http://prashanta.me/wls
